_comment: Remember: This file cannot contain images as require(image) cannot have dynamically generated strings.

events.title: Opening Ceremonies
events.description: Welcome to our ninth annual JordanCon's Opening Ceremonies Extravaganza!

events.title: WoT for Beginners
events.description: New to the Wheel? Reading but not finished? Tagging along with a friend or significant other? Come to our orientation; we'll take questions and avoid spoilers.

events.title: Meet the Bird Whisperers!
events.description: Amanda Makepeace and Melissa Gay, founders of the #BirdWhispereProject, share the art that results when artists celebrate a shared love of our feathered friends by using the same visual references for their work.

events.title: Welcome to the Potterverse
events.description: Harry Potter, Hogwarts, Marauders, Fantastic Beasts, Cursed Child, Wizarding World, books, movies, theme parks. Let's discuss J.K. Rowling's universe.

events.title: Art Show & Dealer Hall - Open for Business
events.description:
The Art Show & Dealer Hall is open from 2:30 PM until 7 PM on Friday.

The JordanCon Charity Auction team will be stationed in the middle of the Dealer Hall during regular business hours to accept your donations for Saturday's Charity Auction to benefit the Mayo Clinic's Amyloidosis research.

events.title: Bringing Your Writing To Your Game
events.description: Games are written too! Whether a board game with lore and story, or a DM's homebrewed campaign setting, the craft has many applications.

events.title: Painting an Art Nouveau Lady
events.description: Video demo of a painting from the planning stages to the finished product. Including a hands on practice for how to get the hair right. Learn from a professional about basic tools and resources to get started with watercolor, with participants Q&As.

events.title: Reading: David B Coe and Jason Denzel
events.description: Readings by Author Guests David B Coe and Jason Denzel

events.title: Novellas and Short Stories
events.description: Discussion of Brandon's shorter works. Includes those in Arcanum Unbounded and stand-alone works.

events.title: Darkfriend
events.description: Wheel of Time themed Werewolf! Come on down and play! Kill your friends as the Darkfriend or Hunt some Darkfriends as one of the villagers!

events.title: Science Facts: 2016 - 2017
events.description: A great way to start off the convention is by hitting the science in our Science Fiction right off the bat. As we do every year, the panelists will discuss a selection of science topics from the previous and current year. Audience participation is encouraged. If you have a science specialty of your own, definitely come and share the exciting news from your profession. In addition, we will discuss how these new discoveries affect our Science Fiction creations.

events.title: Introduction to Flat Pattern Alterations
events.description:
Ever had a pattern you love, but it needs a few changes to work for a new outfit?
Learn to alter your patterns so you don't have to buy a new one every time. Learn to alter the final look of a design with a few simple changes.

Students will practice various methods with a paper bodice pattern to create new patterns.
Please note this class is not how to sew a pattern or how to make a pattern fit you.

events.title: Blademaster Tournament
events.description: There are two ways to become a blademaster. Vie with other attendees for the chance to fight against a blademaster to become a blademaster.

events.title: Book Spotlight: Mistborn 1
events.description: We discuss Mistborn as a novel. Topics include story structure and pacing, characterization, and how Brandon's style and skills have evolved since writing it.

events.title: Plotting with Story Structure
events.description: Whether using the 3-Act format or the Hero's Journey, structure is what makes a story readable, and sometimes even writeable.

events.title: Streaming Atmo: The Past, Present, and Future of Military SF
events.description: Military Science Fiction has been a staple of the greater genre for a long time. Indeed some of the earliest science fiction touched on war and the terrible consequences of conflict. Military SF is changing and evolving year by year, so let's discuss where we have come from and where we are going.
